experiment: F-BRN4 INDEX dark matter reduction â€” hippocampal index coverage sprint
expect: Coverage from 76.4% to >=80% by assigning recent lessons to themes
method: Sum INDEX.md theme counts vs total lesson files. Identify unthemed lessons L-532+. Assign to buckets. Add Phase Science & Emergence as new theme (7 lessons).
diff: Expected >=80% coverage. Achieved 83.4% (+7pp). New theme Phase Science & Emergence captures phase transition / MDL / brain lessons that had no prior home. Concurrent sessions added 9 new lessons during this session (509->518), making coverage harder to maintain.
hippocampal_insight: F-BRN4 metric (INDEX coverage) is a proxy for hippocampal index health. At 83.4%, the index can pattern-complete for ~83% of the knowledge corpus. The remaining 17% (86 lessons) are 'cortical orphans' -- encoded but not retrievable via the index. Concurrent session velocity (9 lessons/session) means dark matter naturally regenerates -- coverage needs active maintenance every 3-5 sessions.
lessons_produced: planned: L-573 (INDEX dark matter maintenance as hippocampal function)
